subject: NCAA Basketball Tournament (Men)
Computers and the Internet
College Athletics
Television
lead_paragraph: Fans unhappy with CBS’s regionalization of the N.C.A.A. tournament found a way to see the games they wanted when CBSSports.com started streaming games online.
snippet: Fans unhappy with CBS’s regionalization of the N.C.A.A. tournament found a way to see the games they wanted when CBSSports.com started streaming games online.
